abstracts.cdata!:
With the Road Rehabilitation and
            Maintenance Project, the country hopes to ameliorate its
            inadequate road network which is now in need of an
            integrated program for construction, modernization,
            rehabilitation maintenance, to meet the burgeoning demand
            for road transport.  To this end, the project specifically
            includes civil works and an institutional development
            program.  The first component of civil works comprises (i)
            road rehabilitation; (ii) deferred maintenance works; and
            (iii) supervision.  In line with this, the institutional
            development program comprises:  (i) preparation of a Road
            Master Plan; (ii) implementation of an action plan for
            improved road maintenance; and (iii) implementation of an
            action plan to strengthen the construction industry.
